author: Eestevens
title: Very Noisy heating
text: Room was small as expected but OK for such a great location close to Central Park. Area felt safe and we could leave our luggage after checking out etc. For the price it wasn't great value. Bedsheets were ripped, stains behind toilet. Worst of all was the banging and clunking of the heating/air-conditioning. It was so loud you couldn't sleep with it turned on and with -12 degrees you needed it! I would not stay again.
